item.title: Chance the Rapper Blasts Spike Lee's 'Chi-Raq': It's 'Exploitive and Problematic'
item.description:
Chance the Rapper Blasts Spike Lee's 'Chi-Raq': It's 'Exploitive and Problematic'

Chance the Rapper has a bone to pick with Spike Lee over the content of Lee's latest film, " Chi-Raq." Chance took to Twitter Friday morning to criticize Lee's modern re-telling of "Lysistrata" by Aristophanes, a Classical Greek play about women withholding sex from their husbands in order to stop their fighting.

item.title: Video: Puff Daddy & The Family feat. Travis Scott & Big Sean - 'Workin (Remix)'
item.description:
Video: Puff Daddy & The Family feat. Travis Scott & Big Sean - 'Workin (Remix)'

Puff Daddy is putting in overtime. Following the surprise release of his album earlier this month, the Bad Boy mogul drops a second video for "Workin." But this time around, he brings Travis Scott and Big Sean into the fray in the Hype Williams-directed clip.

item.title: (Photo) Scarface Actor Robert Loggia Dies At 85 - In Flex We Trust
item.description:
(Photo) Scarface Actor Robert Loggia Dies At 85 - In Flex We Trust

Robert Loggia who you may remember for his role as King Pin Frank Lopez in "Scarface", has died this afternoon at 85 years old. The actor had been struggling with Alzheimers for the last 5 years and a sudden rebound Wednesday night ended up in a sudden death today.

item.title: The Spotify Blog
item.description:
The Spotify Blog

Today Spotify releases its annual Year in Music top lists -- revealing the artists and songs that were the most popular with music fans around the world in 2015.This year, more music was listened to by more music fans than ever before around the world, with over 75 million listeners enjoying over 20 billion hours...
